Edvard Grieg

Lyric Pieces, Book 9, op. 68

c. 1898–1899

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 16'

  • 1. Sailor’s Song
  • 2. Grandmother’s Minuet
  • 3. At Your Feet
  • 4. Evening in the Mountains
  • 5. At the Cradle
  • 6. Valse mélancolique

Grieg orchestrated the fourth and fifth pieces in 1899.
